cohortName: [PL 435783001] Schizophrenia referent concept incident cohort: First occurrence of referent concept + descendants with >=365d prior observation
logicDescription: Persons with condition occurrence of referent concept (435783) or descendants, for the first time in the person's history. Persons exit cohort at the end of the observation period.

cohortName: [PL 435783002] Schizophrenia referent concept prevalent cohort: First occurrence of referent concept + descendants
logicDescription: Persons with condition occurrence of referent concept (435783) or descendants, for the first time in the person's history, with at least 365 days of prior continuous observation. Persons exit cohort at the end of the observation period.

cohortName: [PL 435783003] Schizophrenia by Ren,  2005 and repeated in literature
logicDescription: Schizophrenia concept set occurring two times within 365 days or 1 inpatient diagnosis/ER visit on the day of diagnosis. Paraphrenia is not included

cohortName: [PL 435783004] Schizophrenia by Lai, E. C. et al. 2014
logicDescription: Schizophrenia concept set not including Paraphrenia and an anti-psychotic within 90 days
